page.title: 04KIRK LANE PARK
page.content: At Kirk Lane Park there are lots of things to play on - a big and a little climbing frame,some baby and some big swings,a rocket and a boat for us to climb and some monkey bars.There are 2 football pitches.My dad plays foot- ball there for the Regent pub.There is a tennis court and a bowling green for the old people.Families can go for walks round the gardens.By{MATTHEW} {SANCTUARY YEADON TARN The tarn is a big lake and people go sailing there.Round the tarn there are trees and rocks.Some people take pic- -nics in summer.The tarn has an island in the middle and sometimes people swim out to it.There are ducks on the tarn and children feed them.There is also a B.M.X track and a park with swings and slides for the little chi- ldren to play on.By{ADAM ESCREET AND {BRIAN FOSTER. }
